---

**Thank you for suggesting improvements to the PANDAS Autoimmune Tracker!** 

Your feature requests help us understand the real needs of families managing PANDAS/PANS conditions. Every suggestion helps us build a better platform that truly serves the community and improves outcomes for children with these complex conditions.

**Remember:** Our mission is to provide healthcare independence and empower families to take control of their child's medical journey. Features that advance this mission are especially valuable to the community.
